//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "barney", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_HEALTH", 2 );
	set ( "SET_TEAM", "Team_TheShop" );
}


affect ( "terrorist1", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{

	task ( "aim" )
	{
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_ENEMY", "barney" );
	}

	dowait ( "aim" );
	wait ( 800.000 );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_AIM", "DEFAULT" );
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
	set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );
}
